message.raw:
Resolves issue #47. We could replace the (KeyError, ValueError) catch with
TypeError, but since the existence of the sequence_index column is guaranteed,
there's no need. Instead, check for a non-null value using pandas.notna.

message:
Resolves issue #47. We could replace the (KeyError, ValueError) catch with
TypeError, but since the existence of the sequence_index column is guaranteed,
